basic.description: Intensive coverage of selected topics in behavioural neuroscience to include, in different years, such topics as neurobiology of learning and memory, neuroendocrinology, biological bases of motivation, biological bases of brain disorders, etc.
basic.subject: PSYC
basic.title: Advanced Topics in Behavioural Neuroscience

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequsites    PSYC205 and PSYC271 and PSYC370.
